channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing Grass Roots
channel.desc: Nore heads out to the legendary King Bank near the Three Kings Islands. It's the ?turu maramataka phase, high energy and also high excitement as Nore attempts to land his first ever takekenui. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: NEW: Tui heads to Gisborne today to catch up with Rozzi who has called about her horse Zana who has a rearing problem.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: NEW: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Principal Hare Rua catches up with Nore to teach him how to catch his first kingi, while Harry Clarke goes after a monster stag. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haututu Hunters
channel.desc: Four city slickers get out of their comfort zones and connect with their whenua and wh?nau. The boys visit Kakahi to hunt and gather with Beulah's father-in-law, but things don't go as planned. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: All Black hero Piri Weepu combines his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Up 2
channel.desc: Hosts Piri Weepu and Matua Parkinson travel around Aotearoa to see what some of our sporting heroes have been up to. Ex-rugby league pro, John Jr Lomax. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.title: Cocomelon

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: NEW: Wai?rea delves into the experiences of a young Polynesian boy during the Dawn Raids in a compelling theater-driven narrative. Episode weaves real stories from Western Springs College students.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: NEW: A polished, moving, and theatrical performance exploring migration, displacment, and identity. Wai?rea delivers one of the most dynamic haka theatre expressions in the series.

channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a M?ori lens. Ani-Piki Tuari shares her insights into managing the "?Tuari Brothers'. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: M? Te Atea
channel.desc: Taramainuku comes to life, through animation. Dr Jeremy T?tere Macleod and Professor Rangi M?t?mua share with us tales of Matariki and the journey through the stars. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: NEW: The eclectic singer Kristi Lane Singer (Haida/Cree) shares her emotional journey of returning home to Haida Gwaii to find love and forgiveness. Directed by Shane Belcourt & Sean Stiller.

channel.title: The Piano
channel.desc: A mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation. (R).

channel.title: The Hui

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Under The Wh?riki

channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Geo and Chantelle still can't see eye to eye, Chantelle takes pity on Tipene, and Kid and Te Ururangi are on red alert with him around. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Jude works at the Royal New Zealand Police college. The program she implements is designed to encourage understanding and empathy for those who work on the front line of family harm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Tina was stalked by her ex-husband for over 3 years. Stalking and cyberstalking are currently not defined by the Crimes Act in New Zealand as an offence. Tina shares her story for change. (R).

channel.title: Life In The FFN

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Capturing the critical moments of building, developing and living on your tupuna whenua. Pio discusses the complex nature of negotiation and land settlement that the wh?nau have overcome. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hua Parakore
channel.desc: This premium 8-part series will explore the diverse ways in which Food and Soil Sovereignty is being realised in Aotearoa by M?ori growers and communities around the motu. (R).

channel.title: Te Hokinga Mai - The Return

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ki Tua
channel.desc: Ki Tua is a podcast with a difference, covering current events and important issues through to formative moments in their lives. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te K?uta
channel.desc: A risque chat show talked around the fireplace in a Te K?uta. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mahi Pai
channel.desc: Kamaka is excited to learn about this clever creature, the Aihe. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: He Rourou
channel.desc: An instructional cooking series aimed at tamariki and wh?nau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Josh and his dog Kazumi crash back in time to face a fearsome girl and her acrobatic sister. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te P?mu K?mara
channel.desc: Marama has a new crush. The tamariki are offered a once in a lifetime opportunity. Tai and Amaia become distant. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Cube
channel.desc: An exciting youth series and a hub for rangatahi content. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki
channel.desc: Young M?ori battle it out in the revolutionary M?ori martial arts competition based upon mau r?kau. Ng? Hua o T? vs Ng? Toa Matarau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ako
channel.desc: P?nia Papa presents M?ori language lessons for intermediate-level learners. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Regionals 2024
channel.desc: Highlights from the Haka Regionals 2024. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Regionals 2024
channel.desc: Highlights from the Haka Regionals 2024. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Super 8 2025 Season
channel.desc: LIVE: The 2025 Super 8 1st XV and other sports will be livestreamed and broadcasted to Whakaata M?ori YouTube ? MAORI ACTIVE.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Karanga The First Voice
channel.desc: Iwi around the motu explore and celebrate karanga in contemporary Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whaik?rero
channel.desc: Whaik?rero masters and practioners examine formal oral traditions from Te Tair?whiti, and scrutinise the evolution of this art form in a contemporary world. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Kaaterama Pou as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Chey discusses the intricacies of Whaik?rero raps. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: Shedding light on the lives of the homeless and impoverished in Aotearoa New Zealand. Six attends the opening of Homeground, Auckland City Missions new facility and residence for the homeless. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: Shedding light on the lives of the homeless and impoverished in Aotearoa New Zealand. Six joins the Maori wardens on Karangahape Road on a Saturday night. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: Puurekireki Marae play Te K?hanga o Tokomaru and R?nui Primary play against Te Tapuaekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aroha Nui Say I Do
channel.desc: An uplifting series documenting the extraordinary lives of M?ori wedding celebrants. Celebrants Iripa and Jess Rangi are working overtime to juggle their busy lives and their new business. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hur? P?pi II
channel.desc: Kalani and Te Rina highlight the importance of preserving and passing on their indigenous language and culture to their p?pi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Whare K?hanga Reo
channel.desc: Communities give some much needed love to tired and run-down k?hanga across New Zealand. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Super Kura
channel.desc: Two years after Clara's big idea, she and her dedicated kaiako can get on with providing a safe haven, where the vulnerable yet super-capable tama ariki children can thrive. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moomins and the Comet Chase
channel.desc: Moomintroll and his friends rush to save everyone in Moomin Valley from a ferocious comet. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Trip To Greece
channel.desc: Actors Rob Brydon and Steve Coogan travel from Troy to Ithaca following in the footsteps of the Odysseus. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sidewalk Karaoke
channel.desc: Te H?mua Nikora hits the streets in search of karaoke talent. (R).
